name: Dungeonopolis
description:
Welcome to Dungeonopolis!

Dungeonopolis is a minimalistic dungeon crawler with bullet hell aspects and like five of the typical tropes. Immerse yourself in the exciting world of the Dungeoneer, wielder of the Pewpews, and defeat a single boss in this demo, with a secret one that can occur rarely.

This game is still in the beginning stages of development, and there are a lot of bugs. Please comment any you find (perhaps with screenshots?) below, so we can get it fixed.
